session_summary: Post-deployment architecture validation planning, TradingRobotPlug.com grade card fix coordination, SSOT domain mapping ownership, devlog compliance coordination, and theme deployment coordination. Created comprehensive validation plans, prioritized grade card fixes, established SSOT coordination protocols, and coordinated theme deployment. Standing by for Agent-1 and Agent-7 refinement completion to begin post-deployment validation.

post_deployment_validation_planning.description: Created comprehensive post-deployment architecture validation plan (POST_DEPLOYMENT_ARCHITECTURE_VALIDATION_PLAN.md) for TradingRobotPlug.com, BUILD-IN-PUBLIC sites, REST API, and V2 compliance. Validation checklists prepared, ready to execute when Agent-1 and Agent-7 complete refinements.

tradingrobotplug_grade_card_coordination.description: Created grade card fix priority document (TRADINGROBOTPLUG_GRADE_CARD_FIX_PRIORITY.md) prioritizing fixes for Agent-1 (REST API endpoints, console errors) and Agent-7 (UI refinement, dark theme, mobile responsiveness). Architecture validation plan ready for post-refinement execution.

ssot_domain_mapping_ownership.description: Accepted Agent-8's SSOT domain mapping and architecture validation work. Established SSOT domain coordination protocol with Agent-1 (SSOT_DOMAIN_COORDINATION_PROTOCOL.md). Coordination workflow defined for integration domain updates.

devlog_compliance_coordination.description: Accepted Agent-6 coordination on devlog posting requirements. Committed to following devlog protocol: Next Steps section, skimmable format, agent-specific channel posting using devlog_poster_agent_channel.py.

tradingrobotplug_theme_deployment.description: Coordinated with Agent-3 and Agent-7 on TradingRobotPlug theme deployment. Deployment plan created (TRADINGROBOTPLUG_THEME_DEPLOYMENT_PLAN.md). Theme deployed and activated (40/44 files uploaded, 4 non-critical files pending).

post_deployment_architecture_validation.description: Post-deployment architecture validation ready. Standing by for Agent-1 (REST API + console errors) and Agent-7 (UI refinement + BUILD-IN-PUBLIC visibility) refinement completion. Validation checklists prepared, ready to execute 1-2 hours after refinements complete.

ssot_domain_mapping.description: SSOT domain mapping ownership established. 32 domains defined, coordination protocol established with Agent-1. Next: Complete 32-domain registry, integrate SSOT validation into architecture review workflow.

tradingrobotplug_platform_architecture.description: TradingRobotPlug platform architecture coordination active. Foundation validated âœ…, plugin implementation validation pending. Active coordination with Agent-1 (integration), Agent-5 (analytics), Agent-7 (web development).

progress_metrics.architecture_plans_created: 2 (Post-Deployment Validation Plan, Grade Card Fix Priority)

high: Execute post-deployment architecture validation when Agent-1 and Agent-7 complete refinements (1-2 hours after completion)
Generate validation report with findings and recommendations
Continue SSOT domain mapping expansion (32-domain registry)
medium: Integrate SSOT validation into architecture review workflow
Continue TradingRobotPlug platform architecture validation as Agent-7 implements plugins
Provide architecture guidance for plugin implementation

blockers: None - All tasks standing by for refinement completion or actively coordinating
notes: Post-deployment validation plans are comprehensive and ready for execution.
SSOT domain mapping ownership transferred from Agent-8, coordination protocol established with Agent-1.
Devlog compliance protocol accepted, will follow standards for all future devlogs.
TradingRobotPlug theme deployment successful, 4 non-critical files pending (not blocking).
lessons_learned: Post-deployment validation requires comprehensive checklists covering architecture, REST API, V2 compliance, and UI/UX.
Grade card fix prioritization helps coordinate parallel refinement work across multiple agents.
SSOT domain coordination protocols ensure consistent domain boundary definitions across agents.
Devlog compliance standards improve human-in-the-loop coordination with clear next steps visibility.
